main event: A farmer observed a large half-sphere shaped object in the sky near Woodstock, Minnesota for 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as fire red and orange, larger than a baseball held at arm's length., It moved slowly northwest, tipping before moving., The object emitted a brilliant light but was silent., The sighting occurred at night, and no optical aids were used to observe it., The witness, Jo George, is a reliable 26-year-old farmer from the area.
witness description: Jo George, 26 years old, Woodstock, Minnesota farmer, very reliable
